string.text: Protective suit. Costs 530 rubles. Weights 18 kg. Features: Special covering, which protects from aspic and burning fuzz. The thorax and back is protected by \ninner bio-metallic plates. Protects the body from anomalies and damage. Waterproof metal-plstic helmet. Has two oxygen tanks. Specifics: on continous usage \nbecomes worthless - breaks and tears.

Protective suit. Costs 140 rubles. Weights 8 kg. Features: Protects the body from week anomalies and light damages. Has an oxygen mask.\nSpecifics: becomes past repair in continous usage - is damaged and breaks.

Protective suit. Costs 310 rubles. Weights 12 kg. Features: covering, which protects from aspic and burning fuzz. Protects the body from anomalies and \ndamages. Waterproof helmet. Has an oxygen tank. Specifics: becomes past repair in continous usage \n- is damaged and breaks.

Protective red colored suit with waterproof helmet. Costs 220 rubles. Weights 11 kg. Features: Protects from fire, acid, gases, from various anomalous \ninfluences and Burning fuzz. Increases the defense agains the physical damage. Has two oxygen tanks. Specifics: becomes past repair in continous usage \n- is damaged and breaks.
Device, which detect the anomaly fields and disturbances, upon the positive reaction produces sound signals. Required to be activated by placing it on the \nbelt.
Personal digital assistant. Crucial device in the Zone.
Flashlight with rather powerful lamp. In the conditions of illumination deficit in the Zone appears to be a helpful mate.
It remains unidentified who is in charge of baking long loafs in the Zone, however they aren't infected and edible. In any case, not a single stalker has \ncomplained so far.
Canned mead from the plundered by stalkers warehouse of foodstuffs of army troops. Hasn't yet been expired.
For want of something better this sausage - breakfast, launch and supper of the common stalker.
Tasteful and nutrient vodka manufactured by "GSC" corporation. Reduces the influence of radiation, but should not be abused.
Reduces the influence of radiation on the ogranism.
Universal medical set. Allows to cure the wounds of various difficulty degree (injuring, burns, poisoning, etc.)
